actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

actions.in_subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To require the Secretary of the Interior to include on the National Register of Historic Places the Avery Point Lighthouse in Groton, Connecticut, and provide $200,000 for the restoration of that lighthouse.
short_title: Avery Point Lighthouse Restoration Act of 2001

summary.text: Avery Point Lighthouse Restoration Act of 2001 - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to include on the National Register of Historic Places the Avery Point Lighthouse, located in Groton, Connecticut, on the Avery Point campus of the University of Connecticut. Provides funding to the University for the Lighthouse's restoration.

titles.title: Avery Point Lighthouse Restoration Act of 2001

To require the Secretary of the Interior to include on the National Register of Historic Places the Avery Point Lighthouse in Groton, Connecticut, and provide $200,000 for the restoration of that lighthouse.
